description: It's useless to me because the window size is three times my screen size when I open an image and it's not possible to change the window size.

Just received my scan and I am very happy that I can view my scan after just installing the program. I am not in medical profession so I have no comparison material and know absolutely nothing about MRI images.
He podido visualizar los ficheros de imagenes en linux al hacer uso de File/Import File (Specificy) / Dico via DCMTK
